short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Calendar Preview, Notes, History, Bookmarks, Tab Management, Time, Weather, Quick Access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A personal browser new tab home page with widgets. Quick access to frequently used web apps, manage windows and tabs as workspaces, preview google calendars, and take notes.
